aboutShort.description: Lean and Agile Leader with nearly 15 years of experience at the crossroads of product, tech, business and management, I have supported scale-ups (ManoMano, SantÃ©Vet, Dougsâ€¦) in their hyper-growth by structuring delivery, leading agile transformations at scale and developing talent. aboutLong.description:
I am a Lean/Agile leader and passionate manager, with nearly 15 years of experience at the crossroads of product, tech, business, and management.

I have supported my teams in scale-ups (ManoMano, SantÃ©Vet, Dougsâ€¦) during hyper-growth by structuring delivery, leading agile transformations at scale, and developing talent. My style is resolutely human, collaborative, and results-oriented.

The teams I work with describe my approach as motivating and engaging. I create the conditions for everyone to grow, gain confidence, and become autonomous. I combine strategic vision (roadmaps aligned with the company's global strategy, adaptation of frameworks to context) with a coaching posture (mentoring, active listening, constructive feedback). My leadership is built on transparency, trust, and excellence.

On a human level, my strengths lie in my ability to unite, motivate, and inspire. I am recognized for my empathy, my ability to build authentic relationships, and my spontaneity, which make collaboration natural and enjoyable. I am also a driver of innovation and change: I like to understand the "why," challenge the status quo pragmatically, test new approaches, learn quickly, and iterate.

What defines me as a manager:
â€¢ People first: I value individual and collective growth, highlight the talent of others, and easily detect everyone's potential.
â€¢ Coach & visionary: I help people grow and lead them toward a shared goal, encouraging the definition of collective and individual objectives.
â€¢ Catalyst: I turn challenges into opportunities and stimulate collective energy, surrounding myself with early adopters to support transformation.
â€¢ Structured & pragmatic: I design clear, realistic (yet ambitious) frameworks.

experiencesShort.description: Technical direction of a team of 25+ developers. Architecture and development of the leading SaaS platform in digital accounting.
Development and architecture of innovative web solutions. Technical team management.

recommendations.name: Alice Montel
recommendations.text: Alec is an exceptional manager who knows how to combine technical vision with human leadership. His collaborative approach has transformed the way we work.

recommendations.name: Domingo Rodriguez
recommendations.text: Working with Alec has been an enriching experience. He creates an environment where everyone can flourish and give their best.

recommendations.name: Florian Dubois
recommendations.text: Alec has a remarkable ability to unite teams around common goals. His technical expertise and leadership sense make him a reference manager.

recommendations.name: Simon Leroy
recommendations.text: Alec perfectly understands technical challenges while maintaining a clear business vision. It's a pleasure to work under his direction.

recommendations.name: Xavier Moreau
recommendations.text: Alec is a natural leader who inspires confidence and respect. His ability to transform challenges into opportunities is remarkable.
